info.name: Global: Black on White - CRT Terminal/TTY Text
info.description: This is a global style, that means that it is not perfect since you cant predict the coding style of every CSS developer on the planet. My goal was to keep this style dependency free -- and not to need tweaks for specific sites. This is as close as it gets, scroll thru screenshots for examples.
info.additionalInfo:
Requires:
CSS2 (CSS3 for best look)
Stylish (for automated setup of overriding style) and Compat. Browser
Terminal Font (Raster Font, vgaoem.fon @ 18pt scaled down to 9pt, which is the usual default in most installations of windows, up to 7 at least).

Issues
You wont be able to see some elements, you will have to decide which sites you want to use it with
